comment: And "Vikings" were peaceful, only Christian propaganda depicted them as barbarians. 's of years of worldly explorations and we never tried to conquer anybody.
amr:
# ::snt And "Vikings" were peaceful, only Christian propaganda depicted them as barbarians. 's of years of worldly explorations and we never tried to conquer anybody.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / peaceful
                  :domain (p2 / person
                        :mod (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Vikistan"))))
            :op2 (d / depict-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / propaganda
                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Christian"))
                        :mod (o / only))
                  :ARG1 p2
                  :ARG2 (b / barbarian)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (e / explore-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (w2 / world)
                  :duration (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year))))
            :op2 (t2 / try-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (c2 / conquer-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (a3 / anybody))
                  :time (e2 / ever))))
